thread.title: 'Thomas Land' Theme Park Is The Most Adorable Dose Of Nostalgia
thread.title_full: 'Thomas Land' Theme Park Is The Most Adorable Dose Of Nostalgia

author: Suzy Strutner
title: 'Thomas Land' Theme Park Is The Most Adorable Dose Of Nostalgia
text:
'Thomas Land' Theme Park Is The Most Adorable Dose Of Nostalgia The Huffington Post 8/27/2015 Suzy Strutner Â© Paul Marotta via Getty Images ATHENA IMAGE We've seen Harry Potter World , Cars Land and even a "Wizard of Oz" amusement park . But where are the train-themed theme parks?!
Thankfully, Thomas knows it's time to get "onboard."
Thomas Land is a theme park all about the world's friendliest locomotive, Thomas the Tank Engine. The wonderland opened this month as part of Edaville , a family amusement park less than an hour's drive from Cape Cod ... and while it's clearly designed to be kid-friendly, the park incites warm fuzzies of nostalgia in even the most stone-hearted adults.
Thomas Land currently features 10 adorable attractions starring Thomas and his friends, like a Cranky the Crane drop ride and a low-impact roller coaster resembling Toby the steam train. This is the only Thomas park in the U.S . -- other permanent Thomas parks exist only in Japan and the U.K.
All aboard!
Thomas isn't the only franchise getting its own park these days. Disney recently announced an upcoming addition of Star Wars Land to its parks in both California and Florida.
